title: If I forgot my password, how can I restore the  Router back to its factory settings?
answer:
To reset your Router Management Interface password, you must reset your Router to the factory default settings.
a) On one side of the router, there is a reset button. Press the reset button for five seconds and the router will be reset to the factory settings. Please notice that: this will change all settings including any modified Wi-Fi settings back to the factory presets.
b) Please log into the management page, Advanced Settings -> System -> Restore Defaults, restore the default settings.
